nodes.text: The Vector was an Imperial Gozanti-class cruiser in the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era, that notably featured red markings on its hull. At one point, it flew with another red-marked Gozanti cruiser in space, where the Vector launched two of its four TIE/ln space superiority starfighters, which were carried on the ship's underside by docking tubes.
The Vector was first mentioned in the 2015 Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack, a part of Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game, on a card of the same name.
